introduction: We offer discounted tuition fees to our alumni, and to our members of staff and their family members.
To see how much you could save, enter the cost of your tuition fees below, then select the discounts that apply to you.

discounts.name: Type of discount
discounts.description: If you’re a student paying your own fees, please select the discount that applies to you from the list below. Please note, you can only select one discount.
